What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Equip lifelink critter with Fireshrieker
2. Attack unblocked
3. Only recieved life for first strike portion What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected 6 life, only gor 3 (3/3 with fireshrieker) What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.18 Please provide any additional information below. Magarena is awesome! :)
author: [zarob...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/110807682538348407793/)
title: Double strike and lifelink only gives first strike life

comments.body:
Thanks for your report.

I tested this in a number of ways:
- Rhox War Monk (lifelink) equipped with Fireshrieker
- Mirran Crusader (double strike) enchanted with Lifelink
- with True Conviction in play (creatures you control have double strike and lifelink)

The result was correct for all.

So I can not reproduce the bug. I'm guessing some other effect was in play although I can't think of what would cause you to only gain life for the first damage dealt. Prevent damage effect maybe?
